hm2WwanMib.name: hm2WwanMib
hm2WwanMib.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 - 7127 -14 -0 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2WwanMib.description: This MIB defines the SNMP interface for Hirschmann WWAN implementation.

hm2WwanCellularSelection.name: hm2WwanCellularSelection
hm2WwanCellularSelection.description: Cellular network selection supported combinations. 'auto' value means all supported networks (GSM/UMTS/LTE).

hm2WwanLtePersistence.name: hm2WwanLtePersistence
hm2WwanLtePersistence.description: When an LTE capable device is connected to a non-LTE network it may not handover to an LTE network when one becomes available if data is being continuously transmitted or received. Enabling this function will insure that a connection over LTE will be maintained whenever LTE is available.

hm2WwanLtePersistenceInterval.name: hm2WwanLtePersistenceInterval
hm2WwanLtePersistenceInterval.description: The number of seconds after which LTE Persistence switch will be attempted. A 0 value means switch without waiting. This time interval is needed to avoid intermittent switches.

hm2WwanFailoverTechnologyLevel.name: hm2WwanFailoverTechnologyLevel
hm2WwanFailoverTechnologyLevel.description: Desired cellular technology limit. If the current cellular network technology falls below this level then failover can be triggered. This mib node is meant to be used in conjunction with hm2WwanBackupSimTechnologyLevel failover scenario.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnection.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnection
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnection.description: Switch to Backup SIM card when data connection fails.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistration.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistration
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistration.description: Switch to Backup SIM when registration fails.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoaming.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoaming
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoaming.description: Switch to Backup SIM when roaming is detected.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimit.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimit
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimit.description: Switch to Backup SIM card when data limit is reached and switch to Primary SIM when data limit is recovered.

hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistration.name: hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistration
hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistration.description: Attempt a Modem reset if both Primary and Backup SIM cards report registration failures. Backup SIM card registration failure might not be needed depending if hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistration is enabled or if the SIM is physical present.

hm2WwanBackupSimTechnologyLevel.name: hm2WwanBackupSimTechnologyLevel
hm2WwanBackupSimTechnologyLevel.description: Switch to Backup SIM card when current cellular technology drops bellow a limit. Configure limit with hm2WwanFailoverTechnologyLevel.

hm2WwanFailoverCycle.name: hm2WwanFailoverCycle
hm2WwanFailoverCycle.description: By default hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnection hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistration will not fallback to using the Primary SIM card if failure is encountered on the Backup SIM card. This mib node will allow falling back to Primary SIM card if Backup SIM card is unable to register or create a connection. The cycled fallback will be done after 60 seconds.

hm2WwanSetTrap.name: hm2WwanSetTrap
hm2WwanSetTrap.description: A bitmap string serving as a enable/disable method for the trap events defined by the WWAN notifications. All traps are enabled by default.

hm2WwanDataConnectionTable.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionTable
hm2WwanDataConnectionTable.description: This table contains configuration options for each WWAN Data connection per SIM card.

hm2WwanDataConnectionSimId.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionSimId
hm2WwanDataConnectionSimId.description: SIM ID for which this connection entry belongs to. Also used as the table's index.

hm2WwanDataConnectionApn.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionApn
hm2WwanDataConnectionApn.description: Access Point Name used to identify the data connection's gateway name in the carriers network. If empty then the default APN configured on the SIM card will be used.

hm2WwanDataConnectionApnCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionApnCurrent
hm2WwanDataConnectionApnCurrent.description: Current Access Point Name used for data connections. If hm2WwanDataConnectionApn is empty then the value shown here represents the automatically detected APN stored on the Sim Card.

hm2WwanDataConnectionUser.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionUser
hm2WwanDataConnectionUser.description: User name used for authentication when settting up a new data connection. Empty value means its not required.

hm2WwanDataConnectionPassword.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionPassword
hm2WwanDataConnectionPassword.description: Pasword asociated with the user name used for authentication when settting up a new data connection. Not readable by the user.

hm2WwanDataConnectionAuth.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionAuth
hm2WwanDataConnectionAuth.description: The type of authentication used when setting up a data connection.

hm2WwanDataConnectionPdpType.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionPdpType
hm2WwanDataConnectionPdpType.description: The IP type of the data connection to set up. It can be IPv4 or IPv6. Currently only IPv4 is supported.

hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressType.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressType
hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressType.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddress value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddress.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddress
hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddress.description: Manual IP address to be used for configuring a new data connection. If 0.0.0.0 then a dynamic IP Address will be assigned by the carrier.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryType.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryType
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryType.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimary value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimary.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimary
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimary.description: Manual IP address to be used for configuring the primary DNS server address for the data connection. If 0.0.0.0 then a dynamic DNS IP Address will be assigned by the carrier.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryType.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryType
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryType.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondary value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondary.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondary
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondary.description: Manual IP address to be used for configuring the secondary DNS server address for the data connection. If 0.0.0.0 then a dynamic DNS IP Address will be assigned by the carrier.

hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrentTyp.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrentType
hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrentTyp.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrent value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrent
hm2WwanDataConnectionIpAddressCurrent.description: The IP Address that the WWAN data interface is currently using.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrentTy.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrentType
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrentTy.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrent value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrent
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsPrimaryCurrent.description: The Primary DNS Address that the WWAN data interface is currently using.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrentType
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent.description: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent value type, either IPv4 or IPv6.

hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent
hm2WwanDataConnectionDnsSecondaryCurrent.description: The Secondary DNS Address that the WWAN data interface is currently using.

hm2WwanDataConnectionMtu.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionMtu
hm2WwanDataConnectionMtu.description: Maximum Transmision Unit used when sending IP packets over the WWAN data interface.

hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetry.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetry
hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetry.description: How many times should a failed WWAN data connection attempt to try reconnecting before aborting and using fallback options or logging error. A value of 0 means no retry attempts and a value of -1 means 'infinite' attempts.

hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetryCurrent.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetryCurrent
hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetryCurrent.description: The current number o data reconnect attempts made. Can only be lower or equal to hm2WwanDataConnectionFailedRetry. Value 0 means no retries have been made.

hm2WwanDataConnectionStatus.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionStatus
hm2WwanDataConnectionStatus.description: Current status of this WWAN Data connection. If in 'Error' state then a reason for the error will be found under hm2WwanDataConnectionStatusErrorReason.

hm2WwanDataConnectionStatusErrorReason.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionStatusErrorReason
hm2WwanDataConnectionStatusErrorReason.description: The reason why this WWAN Data connection is in 'Error' state.

hm2WwanDataConnectionActivatedCount.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionActivatedCount
hm2WwanDataConnectionActivatedCount.description: How many times this WWAN Data connection was successfuly established.

hm2WwanDataConnectionUpTime.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionUpTime
hm2WwanDataConnectionUpTime.description: Time in seconds since this connection is active.

hm2WwanDataConnectionTotalUpTime.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionTotalUpTime
hm2WwanDataConnectionTotalUpTime.description: Total time in which this connection was active.

hm2WwanDataPlanTable.name: hm2WwanDataPlanTable
hm2WwanDataPlanTable.description: This table contains configuration options for each WWAN Data Plan per SIM card.

hm2WwanDataPlanSimId.name: hm2WwanDataPlanSimId
hm2WwanDataPlanSimId.description: SIM ID for which this connection entry belongs. Also used as the table's index.

hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyLimit.name: hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyLimit
hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyLimit.description: The amount of data that the carrier will charge as per a WWAN data contract per month. A value 0 means unlimited.

hm2WwanDataPlanLimitMeasureUnit.name: hm2WwanDataPlanLimitMeasureUnit
hm2WwanDataPlanLimitMeasureUnit.description: Which measure unit is used to interpret the volume of the data traffic. Possible units are: Kilobytes, Megabytes, Gigabytes.

hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThreshold.name: hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThreshold
hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThreshold.description: The percentage of the volume of data that when reached will generate a warning. A value of 0 will disable the warning.

hm2WwanDataPlanReset.name: hm2WwanDataPlanReset
hm2WwanDataPlanReset.description: Manually reset the data plan counters. Only the value 'action(2)' can be written and when read 'noop(1)' will always be returned.

hm2WwanDataPlanResetDay.name: hm2WwanDataPlanResetDay
hm2WwanDataPlanResetDay.description: Which day of the month will be used to auto reset the data plan counters. A value of 0 will disable the reset action. The reset action will be performed at 00:00am in the selected day.

hm2WwanDataPlanLastReset.name: hm2WwanDataPlanLastReset
hm2WwanDataPlanLastReset.description: Time in seconds since Jan 1st, 1970 when the last data plan counters were resetted.

hm2WwanDataPlanCutoffThreshold.name: hm2WwanDataPlanCutoffThreshold
hm2WwanDataPlanCutoffThreshold.description: The percentage of the volume of used data that when reached will completely disable any data connections associated with this SIM ID. A value of 0 will disable the cutoff.

hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageTx.name: hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageTx
hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageTx.description: The amount of data that was transmitted since last reset. The measure unit is the same as hm2WwanDataPlanLimitMeasureUnit.

hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageRx.name: hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageRx
hm2WwanDataPlanMonthlyUsageRx.description: The amount of data that was received since last reset. The measure unit is the same as hm2WwanDataPlanLimitMeasureUnit.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTable.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTable
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTable.description: This table contains packet statistics for each WWAN Data connection per SIM card.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsSimId.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsSimId
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsSimId.description: SIM ID for which this data connection packet statistics entry belongs to. Also used as the table's index.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOk.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOk
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOk.description: The number of successfully transmitted data packets.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOk.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOk
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOk.description: The number of successfully received data packets.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxErrors.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxErrors
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxErrors.description: The number of errors encountered during packet transmission.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxErrors.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxErrors
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxErrors.description: The number of errors encountered during packet reception.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOverflows.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOverflows
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxOverflows.description: The number of overflows encountered during packet transmission.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOverflows.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOverflows
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxOverflows.description: The number of overflows encountered during packet reception.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxBytesOk.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxBytesOk
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxBytesOk.description: The number of successfully transmitted bytes.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxBytesOk.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxBytesOk
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxBytesOk.description: The number of successfully received bytes.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxDropped.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxDropped
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsTxDropped.description: The number of packets dropped during transmission.

hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxDropped.name: hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxDropped
hm2WwanDataPacketStatsRxDropped.description: The number of packets dropped during reception.

hm2WwanSimCardTable.name: hm2WwanSimCardTable
hm2WwanSimCardTable.description: This table contains configuration options for each WWAN SIM card.

hm2WwanSimCardSimId.name: hm2WwanSimCardSimId
hm2WwanSimCardSimId.description: SIM ID for which this connection entry belongs. Also used as the table's index.

hm2WwanSimCardRole.name: hm2WwanSimCardRole
hm2WwanSimCardRole.description: The role this Sim Card will be assigned. The role is important for failover scenarios configured under General Configuration Group. 'auto' setting will automatically choose a role.

hm2WwanSimCardRoleCurrent.name: hm2WwanSimCardRoleCurrent
hm2WwanSimCardRoleCurrent.description: The role this Sim Card is currently using.

hm2WwanSimCardStatus.name: hm2WwanSimCardStatus
hm2WwanSimCardStatus.description: Sim Card Status information: * simPresent: the SIM is physicaly present. * simAbsent: the SIM is physicaly absent. * simLocked: the SIM is physicaly present but was not unlocked using PIN1. * simUnlocked: the SIM is physicaly present and it was unlocked unsing PIN1. * simInactive: the sim is physicaly present but it is not used for data connections. * simActive: the sim is physicaly present and is used for data connections.

hm2WwanSimCardSetActive.name: hm2WwanSimCardSetActive
hm2WwanSimCardSetActive.description: Manual operation to set the active status of this sim card. When in active state this sim card will be used for establishing data connections.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1
hm2WwanSimCardPin1.description: Sim Card's PIN1 code. PIN1 is used to unlock main Sim functions which will allow Network Carrier Registration.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1Mode.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1Mode
hm2WwanSimCardPin1Mode.description: Allows to enable or disable PIN1 code. With PIN1 disabled the Sim Card will automatically unlock all it's functions.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1Status.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1Status
hm2WwanSimCardPin1Status.description: Pin1 status information: * NotVerified: Pin1 was not verified. * Verified: Pin1 was successfuly verified. * Blocked: Wrong Pin1 was used too many times and the Sim Card blocked it. * Disabled: Pin1 was manually disabled or the Sim Card does not requires it. * WrongCode: The configured Pin1 code is not accepted by the Sim Card unlock function.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1VerifyTries.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1VerifyTries
hm2WwanSimCardPin1VerifyTries.description: The amount of times a wrong Pin1 code can be used to unlock the Sim Card until it is blocked.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1UnblockTries.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1UnblockTries
hm2WwanSimCardPin1UnblockTries.description: The amount of times a wrong PUK1 code can be entered to unblock a PIN1 code.

hm2WwanSimCardPuk1.name: hm2WwanSimCardPuk1
hm2WwanSimCardPuk1.description: PUK1 code is used to unblock a PIN1 code. Writing a PUK1 value will attempt to unblock a PIN1 code if the PIN1 code is in 'Blocked' state. PUK1 code will not be saved. hm2WwanSimCardPin1UnblockTries is a counter on how many times a wrong PUK1 code can be entered. Empty value write operation will be ignored. New PIN code configured during the unblock operation will be the current PIN1 stored in hm2WwanSimCardPin1 mib.

hm2WwanSimCardRoamingMode.name: hm2WwanSimCardRoamingMode
hm2WwanSimCardRoamingMode.description: Roaming will allow the modem to perform registration with carriers other than the one that emitted the current SIM card. Data connections established when attached to Roaming partners will probably incur additional costs.

hm2WwanSimCardIccid.name: hm2WwanSimCardIccid
hm2WwanSimCardIccid.description: Integrated Circuit Card Identifier is the international SIM's identifier. This value is preserved over reboots so that when a new SIM is inserted the operation can be detected and the settings relevant for the old SIM can be resetted. The user can only read this mib value.

hm2WwanSimCardImsi.name: hm2WwanSimCardImsi
hm2WwanSimCardImsi.description: International Mobile Subscriber Identity is an individual identifier on operator networks. Mobile network operators connect mobile phone calls and communicate with their market SIM cards using their IMSIs.

hm2WwanCellularActiveSimId.name: hm2WwanCellularActiveSimId
hm2WwanCellularActiveSimId.description: The Sim Card id for the current active SIM.

hm2WwanCellularRegistration.name: hm2WwanCellularRegistration
hm2WwanCellularRegistration.description: The current status of the Sim's Carrier Registration.

hm2WwanCellularNetwork.name: hm2WwanCellularNetwork
hm2WwanCellularNetwork.description: Current Cellular Network Technology being used.

hm2WwanCellularMcc.name: hm2WwanCellularMcc
hm2WwanCellularMcc.description: Mobile Country Code is a 3 digits code used to identify the country where the Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) resides.

hm2WwanCellularMnc.name: hm2WwanCellularMnc
hm2WwanCellularMnc.description: Mobile Network Code is a 2 to 3 digits code used to identify the Public Land Mobile Network (PLMN) in that country.

hm2WwanCellularLac.name: hm2WwanCellularLac
hm2WwanCellularLac.description: Location area code together with PLMN (MCC + MNC) creates an internationally unique identifier known as Location Area Identity (LAI). The LAI is used for location updating of the mobile subscribers.

hm2WwanCellularBsic.name: hm2WwanCellularBsic
hm2WwanCellularBsic.description: Base Station Identity Code is a code used in WWAN networks to uniquely identify a base station.

hm2WwanCellularCellId.name: hm2WwanCellularCellId
hm2WwanCellularCellId.description: The identifier of the current used WWAN Cell.

hm2WwanCellularBand.name: hm2WwanCellularBand
hm2WwanCellularBand.description: The current Cellular Band used for radio transmissions.

hm2WwanCellularChannel.name: hm2WwanCellularChannel
hm2WwanCellularChannel.description: The current channel number within the Cellular Band used for radio transmissions.

hm2WwanCellularSignalStrength.name: hm2WwanCellularSignalStrength
hm2WwanCellularSignalStrength.description: In GSM/UMTS mobile networks signal strength is based on RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indication) value measuring the power level being received by the antena. The higher the RSSI the stronger the signal.

hm2WwanCellularSignalStrengthLte.name: hm2WwanCellularSignalStrengthLte
hm2WwanCellularSignalStrengthLte.description: In LTE mobile networks signal strength is based on RSRP (Reference Signal Received Power) value.

hm2WwanCellularSignalQuality.name: hm2WwanCellularSignalQuality
hm2WwanCellularSignalQuality.description: UMTS signal quality indicator based on ECIO (Energy to Interference Ratio).

hm2WwanCellularSignalQualityLte.name: hm2WwanCellularSignalQualityLte
hm2WwanCellularSignalQualityLte.description: LTE signal quality indicator based on RSRQ (Reference Signal Received Quality).

hm2WwanCellularRscp.name: hm2WwanCellularRscp
hm2WwanCellularRscp.description: UMTS Received Signal Code Power is used as an indication of signal strength, as a handover criterion, in downlink power control and to calculate path loss.

hm2WwanCellularRoamingStatus.name: hm2WwanCellularRoamingStatus
hm2WwanCellularRoamingStatus.description: Current Roaming status: * Home: registration done in home network. * Roaming: registration done in partner network in roaming mode. Roaming has to be admin enabled. * RoamingDisabled: no home network detected and Roaming is admin disabled.

hm2WwanCellularBitErrorRate.name: hm2WwanCellularBitErrorRate
hm2WwanCellularBitErrorRate.description: Cellular transmission error rate displayed in percentage.

hm2WwanCellularCurrentTxRate.name: hm2WwanCellularCurrentTxRate
hm2WwanCellularCurrentTxRate.description: Current channel TX rate displayed in kbps.

hm2WwanCellularCurrentRxRate.name: hm2WwanCellularCurrentRxRate
hm2WwanCellularCurrentRxRate.description: Current channel RX rate displayed in kbps.

hm2WwanCellularMaxTxRate.name: hm2WwanCellularMaxTxRate
hm2WwanCellularMaxTxRate.description: Maximum channel TX rate that can be achieved, displayed in kbps.

hm2WwanCellularMaxRxRate.name: hm2WwanCellularMaxRxRate
hm2WwanCellularMaxRxRate.description: Maximum channel RX rate that can be achieved, displayed in kbps.

hm2WwanModemModel.name: hm2WwanModemModel
hm2WwanModemModel.description: The model of the Radio Modem.

hm2WwanModemImei.name: hm2WwanModemImei
hm2WwanModemImei.description: Internation Mobile Equipment Identity is a unique number given to mobile capable devices.

hm2WwanRoamingActiveTrap.name: hm2WwanRoamingActiveTrap
hm2WwanRoamingActiveTrap.description: Notification generated whenever Roaming status will become active.

hm2WwanLtePersistenceSwitchTrap.name: hm2WwanLtePersistenceSwitchTrap
hm2WwanLtePersistenceSwitchTrap.description: Notification generated when LTE Persistence function will perform a switch back to LTE.

hm2WwanCelluarRegistrationFailedTrap.name: hm2WwanCelluarRegistrationFailedTrap
hm2WwanCelluarRegistrationFailedTrap.description: Notification generated whenever a Cellular Network Registration failure occurs.

hm2WwanDataConnectionSetupTrap.name: hm2WwanDataConnectionSetupTrap
hm2WwanDataConnectionSetupTrap.description: Notification generated whenever a Cellular Data Connection will change its status.

hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThresholdTrap.name: hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThresholdTrap
hm2WwanDataPlanWarningThresholdTrap.description: Notification generated when the Data Plan Warning Threshold is reached. The trap is resent after each 25% of remaining data is consumed all the way up until the Data Plan Limit is reached.

hm2WwanSimCardPin1StatusTrap.name: hm2WwanSimCardPin1StatusTrap
hm2WwanSimCardPin1StatusTrap.description: Notification generated whenever SIM Card PIN1 access functions are used and their status changes.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnectionTrap.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnectionTrap
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverConnectionTrap.description: Notification generated whenever a data connection on the Primary SIM Card fails and a failover to Backup SIM Card is done.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistrationTrap.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistrationTrap
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRegistrationTrap.description: Notification generated whenever a cellular network registration the Primary SIM Card fails and a failover to Backup SIM Card is done.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoamingTrap.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoamingTrap
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverRoamingTrap.description: Notification generated whenever a cellular network registration to a Roaming Carrier is detected on the Primary SIM Card and as a result a failover to the Backup SIM Card is done.

hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimitTrap.name: hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimitTrap
hm2WwanBackupSimFailoverDataLimitTrap.description: Notification generated when the current Data Plan Limit is reached and a failover to the Backup SIM Card is done.

hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistrationTra.name: hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistrationTrap
hm2WwanModemResetFailoverRegistrationTra.description: Notification generated when cellular network registration fails on the Primary SIM Card and also the fallback to Backup SIM Card registration fails.

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Fri May 24 19:20:47 2019
